select
,
from miss_symptom
id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and chinese_name like CONCAT('%',#{chineseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and english_name like CONCAT('%',#{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and other_name like CONCAT('%',#{otherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and symptom like CONCAT('%',#{symptom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and common_symptom like CONCAT('%',#{commonSymptom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
select b.id as id, chinese_name, english_name from miss_disease_symptom_mapping a left join miss_symptom b on a.symptom_id = b.id where a.disease_id = #{id}

select id, chinese_name, english_name from miss_symptom
chinese_name like CONCAT('%',#{chineseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and english_name like CONCAT('%',#{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
